paragraphs: The famous American singer Katy Perry will perform a concert in Prague. The show of one of the brightest stars of contemporary pop music will take place on October 30, 2025, at the O2 Arena as part of the artist's world tour The Lifetimes Tour.
Members of the Live Nation club will be able to buy tickets first - starting at 10:00 on Wednesday, December 11th. For everyone else, tickets will go on sale at 10:00 on Friday, December 13th.
You will be able to buy them at Ticketmaster and Ticketportal networks (the names are clickable). The cost is from 2290 crowns.
Let's remind you, the last time Katy Perry performed in Prague was in February 2015, also at the "O2 Arena". So, the singer will return to the Czech capital after ten years.
